评论详情: This shirt runs much smaller than expected and the material has no stretch and is stiff.
Good quality for the price. Washes well and holds shape

I loved the logo on the tee shirt, that is why I purchased it. After I washed in cold, and did not put it in the dryer, When I went to wear it again, it had started to unravel at the neck, not just a small ravel, but the kind if you pull it or cut it, the whole thing ravels out. Waste of my money, disappointed because I did like the looks of the shirt. I can now use it as a paint shirt. Buyer beware.
This is NOT an XL.  I have ordered many shirts in this size but this fits more like a small.

评论概述: YOU GET EXACTLY WHAT YOUR BUYING

评论详情: Comfy and fits great. Someone said they wanted to get this tattooed on their arm.

评论概述: Cute style, the print is not very bright.
评论详情: This T-shirt is cuter than I expected. The material is soft and thick enough (not see-through). The shirt is hip length (I’m 5,4 feet tall); is not tight and is not loose either. I usually wear XS, I ordered S and it fits just right. I gave 4 stars because the black color looks slightly washed off but maybe it’s the way this shirt is supposed to be. The tiny print is not very bright and I have a feeling that it will disappear after a number of washes.
LOVE this shirt!! Perfect for Adventures.
